name: Nilanjana The Game
description:
Nilanjana is a lady who works in a office. One night she was working late and all of a sudden got stuck inside the office and a psycho lover of her tried to block her and want her as his own lover.
This game is all about how she escapes the situation and save herself.

Pure 3D game
Original sounds
Real time simulated 3D environment
Starring Priyanka Sarkar, Mainak Banerjee
